overview: Jejou is a magical and visually powerful story that alternates and unites the popular traditions of the Guarani Mby√°, native inhabitants of the Misiones jungle, and the Poles, who from the end of the 19th century came to Misiones (Argentina) in search of a better life. future. It is a story of encounter, love, union, friendship, collaboration, learning, respect.
title: Jejou
